s: It seems that Body Fortress puts a high stress on including Aminos and other fillers which reduces the actual protein amount to about 61% per scoop. What this means is that you need to use more powder than other leading brands in order to get the same amount of protein.

t: Amazon.com: Body Fortress Super Advanced Whey Protein Powder, Plus Creatine and Glutamine, Gluten Free, Vanilla, 32 Ounce (2lb) : Health & Household
